name.title: Service name
name.description: The name of the service instance

user.title: User
user.description: The user that the service will run as.

service_account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)
service_account_secret.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

log_level.description: The log level for the DC/OS service.

cpus.title: CPU count
cpus.description: Number of CPUs to allocate to the Airflow DAG Scheduler process

mem.title: Memory size (MB)
mem.description: Amount of Memory to allocate to the Airflow DAG Scheduler process (in MB)

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: Amount of disk space to reserve for the Airflow DAG Scheduler process (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

docker_image.title: Airflow Scheduler Docker Image
docker_image.description: Airflow Scheduler Docker Image (defaults to dockerhub.com)

parallelism.title: Task Parallelism
parallelism.description: The amount of parallelism as a setting to the executor. This defines the max number of task instances that should run simultaneously on this airflow installation

dag_concurrency.title: DAG Concurrency
dag_concurrency.description: The number of task instances allowed to run concurrently by the scheduler

max_active_runs_per_dag.title: Maximum Active Runs per Dag
max_active_runs_per_dag.description: The maximum number of active DAG runs per DAG

use_docker_container.title: Use a docker container to run DAG tasks
use_docker_container.description: True of you want to launch your DAG tasks in a docker container (no need to have Airflow loaded on worker nodes)

default_docker_container_image.title: Your Airflow Tasks Docker Container
default_docker_container_image.description: The name of the docker image to use when running your DAG tasks

cpus.description: Number of CPUs to allocate to the Airflow Webserver process

mem.title: Memory size (MB)
mem.description: Amount of Memory to allocate to the Airflow Webserver process (in MB)

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: Amount of disk space to reserve for the Airflow Webserver process (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS
